articles.title: U.S. Aggressor Forces and S. Korean Puppet Army Warned against Their Reckless Provocations
articles.content:
U.S. Aggressor Forces and S. Korean Puppet Army Warned against Their Reckless Provocations
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) released a statement Friday in connection with the fact that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces side is getting extremely undisguised in its provocative acts of rattling the nerves of the KPA side in the area of Panmunjom.
					 The statement said:
					
					 GIs hurled fully armed MPs of the south Korean puppet army into perpetrating such dangerous provocations as aiming at the KPA side at Oryonggye post on April 20 and 21. Such provocation continued till April 26. Earlier, GIs on patrol duty pointed their fingers at KPA service personnel on guard duty, making weird remarks on April 7. On April 10 they mocked at the KPA side through disgusting expression and behavior.
					
					 Moreover, they are intentionally causing confusion by letting a lot of military personnel mill around in the area of the meeting room of Panmunjom under the pretext of "topographic survey" and " confirmation of duties." They are even kicking up a row, staging an odd farce of "notification" with a loudspeaker near the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that such serious provocations are timed to coincide with the unprecedented all-out offensive to stifle the DPRK by force such as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint war drills.
					
					 The area of Panmunjom, where two rival parties are leveling their guns at each other all the time, is the hottest spot where any slight accidental provocative act may result in catastrophic consequences baffling human  imagination at a moment.
					
					 It is well illustrated by a lot of incidents that occurred in the area in the past.
					
					 The U.S. aggressor forces side must be aware of this. It is, however, resorting to serious provocations against on-duty service personnel of the other side, prompted by its premeditated and intentional sinister design.
					
					 It will have to pay dearly for its ill-advised attempt to impair the high prestige of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK by straining the already acute situation to the maximum by provoking the KPA side in the sensitive area of Panmunjom and passing the buck for it to the KPA side.
					
					 The service personnel of the KPA in Panmunjom keep themselves fully ready to mercilessly punish the provocateurs if their reckless actions go beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 If any clash occurs under the present situation where there is no legal and institutional mechanism to prevent physical clash between both sides, it is bound to cause an unpredictable incident. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their stooges should not forget even a moment what miserable end provocateurs met while going reckless in the area at the risk of death. 
					
					 There is a limit to the patience of the greatly infuriated service personnel of the KPA.
					
					 If they persist in their hooliganism despite its repeated warnings, they will meet dog's death any time and in any place.
					
					 The KPA will closely follow the future moves of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' side from this moment.

articles.title: Korean-American Sentenced to 10 Years of Hard Labor
articles.content:
Korean-American Sentenced to 10 Years of Hard Labor
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Court of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on April 29 held a trial on Kim Tong Chol, a Korean-American who was arrested while perpetrating the state subversive plots and espionage against the DPRK.
					 Attending the trial as observers were citizens from different walks of life.
					
					 The trial examined the case of Kim, accused of violations of Articles 60 and 64 of the DPRK Criminal Code. And a written indictment confirming his crimes was submitted before inquiries into the facts of the case.
					
					 In the course of the inquiry, the accused confessed to all crimes he had committed to overthrow the social system of the DPRK while viciously slandering the dignity of its supreme leadership and its political system and gathered and offered information on its party, state and military affairs to the south Korean puppet regime, which are tantamount to state subversive plots and espionages.
					
					 Then, witnesses made statements and evidence was presented to prove the crimes of the accused.
					
					 The prosecutor demanded 15 years of hard labor to the accused, contending that he is bound to face a stern punishment under the DPRK law as he committed the said offenses in a scheme to overthrow the socialist system of the DPRK.
					
					 The defense counsel asked the court to commute the demanded penalty, arguing that the crimes by the accused are very serious but he is old and may repent of his faults, witnessing for himself the true picture of the prospering DPRK.
					
					 The court sentenced him to ten years of hard labor.

articles.title: Polish Embassy Gives Reception
articles.content:
Polish Embassy Gives Reception
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Polish embassy here gave a reception Friday on the occasion of the constitution day, the national day of Poland. 
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Ambassador Krzysztof Ciebien and staff members of the Polish embassy were on hand.

articles.title: President of ITF Arrives
articles.content:
President of ITF Arrives
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: Delegation of International Peace Fund Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of International Peace Fund Arrives
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Peace Foundation headed by Chairman of its Advisory Board Alfred, prince of the Liechtenstein Principality, arrived here on Friday to take part in the event "International Academic Exchange for Peace and Development".

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday.
					 He laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of the great leaders to pay tribute to them on the same day.

articles.title: Lao Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions headed by President of its Central Committee Pan Noymany who is member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Goes Operational
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a tropas agresoras yanquis
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion en relacion con que en estos dias se tornan extremadamente intensos los malignos actos provocativos de la parte de tropas agresoras norteamericanas ofendiendo seriamente a la parte de la RPDC.
					Segun ella, los dias 20 y 21, la parte de tropas yanquis cometio los peligrosos actos provocativos de incitar en el puesto de Oryonggye a los gendarmes titeres armados completamente para que estos apunten con precision a la parte nuestra. Tales hechos siguieron hasta el dia 26 del mes en curso.
					
					Con anterioridad, o sea, el dia 7, en medio de la patrulla dio alaridos extranos indicando con el dedo a los miembros de guardia de nuestra parte. Tambien el dia 10 se mofo a la parte nuestra con los gestos y acciones raros.
					
					Por otra parte, crea de modo intencional los disturbios haciendo que muchas personas militares anden en grupo en la zona de reunion de Phanmunjom bajo el pretexto de la "averiguacion topografica" y la "confirmacion de mision". Y arma alborotos orquestando la farsa de "aviso" extravagante llevando el altavoz en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que tales actos se coinciden con el momento en que los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 de caracter agresivo y otros se enfocan a la ofensiva de aplastamiento militar sin precedente contra la RPDC.
					
					La zona de Phanmunjom, donde ambas partes hostiles se enfrentan siempre arma con arma, es el lugar mas candente en que un minimo acto provocativo causal podra ocasionar en un santiamen las consecuencias catastroficas inimaginables.
					
					Lo demuestran claramente sinnumeros incidentes ocurridos en esta zona en el tiempo pasado.
					
					A sabiendas, la parte de tropas agresoras yanquis recurre a tales actos provocativos ofendiendo gravemente a los miembros de guardia de su contraparte, lo cual parte de su malsana intencion planificada e intencional. 
					
					Pagara sin falta el precio de sangre la perversa intencion de agravar la situacion tan tensa ofendiendo a nosotros en la region delicada de Phanmunjom e imputarnos su responsabilidad manchando el prestigio digno de nuestro Partido y patria 
					
					Nuestros soldados en Phanmunjom mantienen el estado de plena alerta para castigar sin piedad a los provocadores en caso de que sus locuras pasen el limite.
					
					Causara seguramente la situacion inesperada el surgimiento del conflicto en actual estado libre de control en que se rompieron completamente los aparatos juridicos e institucionales para impedir el choque fisico entre ambas partes.
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos nunca deben olvidar el fin tragico de los provocadores que actuaban con frenesi en esta zona.
					
					Tiene su limite la paciencia de nuestro ejercito indignado furiosamente.
					
					Si los enemigos siguen recurriendo a la picardia pese a nuestras advertencias reiteradas, sufriran solo la muerte de perro, en cualquier tiempo y lugar.
					
					Desde este momento, nuestro ejercito vigilara severamente los proximos movimientos de la parte de las tropas agresivas norteamericanas.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Closes
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Closes
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday. It was opened to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 In the games men players of the Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army and the Pyongyang Sports Team set world new records and new records of the Republic at the shooting, archery and weightlifting events.
					
					 The April 25 Sports Team placed first in the standings.
					
					 Men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team won basketball games.
					
					 They also took the first place in the volleyball games.

articles.title: 22nd Individual Contest for February 16 Art Prize Closed
articles.content:
22nd Individual Contest for February 16 Art Prize Closed
Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The 22nd individual contest for February 16 art prize was closed with due ceremony at the Moranbong Theatre Friday.
					 The contest was opened on Feb. 12. It was divided into 12 panels including national instrumental music, vocal music and dance.
					
					 Pyongyang and local art organizations, artistes, teachers and students in the field of art education and overseas Korean artistes presented their artistic talents in the contest.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Basic Science Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Basic Science Held
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of basic science took place at the Sci-Tech Complex from April 26 to 29 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and graduate students in the field of basic science.
					
					 The presentation was divided into sections of mathematics, dynamics, physics, laser and geography. The participants heard more than 400 papers presented by scores of units such as Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Chongjin University of Mining and Metallurgy, University of Sciences, the State Academy of Sciences and the State Designing Guidance Bureau.
					
					 Those participants from local areas made real-time distance presentations at Kim Jong Suk University of Education, Sinuiju University of Education No. 2, Kanggye University of Agriculture and Forestry, the North Hamgyong Provincial Sci-Tech Exhibition, the South Phyongan Provincial Library, the Hamhung Woolen Mill and the Sariwon Unha Garment Factory.
					
					 The participants introduced the successes and experience gained in the research into basic science.

articles.title: Advantageous System for Nursing and Bringing up Children
articles.content:
Advantageous System for Nursing and Bringing up Children
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- All things necessary for nursing and bringing up children are provided at state expense on the principle of "Best things to children" in the DPRK.
					 Children are enjoying equal benefits from the state and society at nurseries and kindergartens built in different parts of the country, regardless of their parents' occupation.
					
					 Especially for parentless children, they are leading a happy life at baby homes and orphanages under the warm care of the state.
					
					 Nurseries, kindergartens, baby homes and orphanages pay primary attention to nourishing children as well as putting the education on a scientific basis.
					
					 In the DPRK, August and September are the months of supporting nurseries and kindergartens.
					
					 This advantageous system is secured on the Law on the Nursing and Upbringing of Children adopted at the Sixth Session of the Fifth Supreme People's Assembly in the presence of President Kim Il Sung on April 29, Juche 65 (1976).

articles.title: Progress Made in Cultivation of New Fodder Crop
articles.content:
Progress Made in Cultivation of New Fodder Crop
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Agricultural units in different parts of the DPRK have made big strides in the cultivation of fodder crop "Aegukphul".
					 Pyongyang City completed a method of root-propagating this grass at greenhouse to produce its seedlings by itself.
					
					 Kangwon Province established an "Aegukphul" seedling production system based on tissue culture and South Phyongan, South Hwanghae, South Hamgyong and other provinces stepped up the production of its seedlings.
					
					 Meanwhile, model cultivation units were selected in different parts of the country.
					
					"Aegukphul", named by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, is a high-yielding and nutritious crop for domestic animals.

articles.title: Koguryo Mural Paintings
articles.content:
Koguryo Mural Paintings
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Mural paintings in the tombs of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) are well known over the world as the cream of ancient mural art.
					 Over 100 mural tombs have been unearthed up to now.
					
					 Painted on the walls and ceilings inside those Koguryo tombs are pictures showing the life of power holders and depicting heavenly bodies like the sun and the moon, cloud, religious images, patterns and others.
					
					 Mural paintings are divided into figure and genre paintings, paintings of four guardians and decorative patterns, according to their themes.
					
					 Typical of murals with the theme of figure and genre are those in the mausoleum of Kogukwon (331-371), the 21st king of Koguryo.
					
					 60-odd Koguryo mural tombs were added to the list of world's cultural heritages in July Juche 93 (2004).

articles.title: KCNA Slams Park Geun Hye Regime's Unprecedented Terrorism
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Park Geun Hye Regime's Unprecedented Terrorism
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea on the verge of ruin is working with bloodshot eyes to prolong its remaining days through terrorism, allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK.
					 It hurled gangsters of the Intelligence Service (IS) into the operation for alluring and abducting 12 innocent women citizens of the DPRK in broad daylight in conspiracy with brokers in Zhejiang Province, China early in April to take them to south Korea, hideous international terrorism.
					
					 This is a shuddering unethical atrocity that can be perpetrated only by the Park group, hordes of confrontation maniacs and barbarians without equals.
					
					 The case is, to all intents and purposes, a premeditated and organized group allurement and abduction.
					
					 All these operations have been manipulated by the Chongwadae so far.
					
					 In June, 2013 Park Geun Hye commanded in the "room for managing crisis" of the underground shelter of the Chongwadae in real time the "operation" for alluring and abducting a group of DPRK citizens and taking them to south Korea, receiving a report from agents of the puppet embassy in a Southeast Asian country.
					
					 The then Dong-A Ilbo of south Korea said it was something unprecedented that the "president" directly commanded the "operation for transferring defectors from the north" reminiscent of a spy operation in the underground shelter of the Chongwadae all day long together with diplomacy and security authorities.
					
					 IS agents, anti-DPRK conspiratorial bodies such as "Duri Hana Missionaries' Society", "Good Friends" and "Council for Improving Human Rights in North Korea" and terrorists and spies under the guise of religionists, businessmen and philanthropists financed by the puppet authorities are active in the Northeast region of China for alluring and abducting operations.
					
					 The puppet forces set up the "Foundation for Supporting Defectors from the North" and the budget for "ferrying defectors from the north" for the purpose of abducting citizens of the DPRK. They are busy conducting modern type slave trade, paying "service money" to south Korean students studying in foreign countries, traders, tourists and even members of foreign mafias.
					
					 They are questioning abductees of the DPRK for six months at the "Central Joint Interrogation Center" made up of those concerned of the IS, the Ministry of Unification, the Defense Ministry and the police. Then they are conducting "anti-communist brainwashing" of them for three or four months, perpetrating all sorts of violence against them in a concentration camp called "Hana Complex."
					
					 The IS gangsters are now forcing "defection" upon the women abductees by employing appeasement, deception, threat and blackmail while claming "they made a group defection at their free will" and "expressed skepticism about the social system in the north".
					
					 If their claim is true, there is no reason for them to keep the abductees in custody in solitary rooms one by one and keep them strictly away from the outside and they are now on a hunger strike, strongly demanding their prompt return to their motherland.
					
					 There is no ground whatsoever for the above-said women to defect to south Korea by abandoning their native places and parents, brothers and sisters.
					
					 The Park group will never be able to escape punishment for having perpetrated the thrice-cursed abduction in a bid to tarnish the image of the DPRK making a long drive.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un's Feats in Party Building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un's Feats in Party Building
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial says that Marshal Kim Jong Un has developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the great party guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and strengthened its leadership ability in every way, the greatest feats performed by the Marshal on behalf of the times and the revolution.
					 Referring to his undying feats in party building, the editorial notes:
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of the great leaders as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and has glorified it as the eternal guiding idea of the party and energetically led the work for modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The ideological and moral foundation of the party and its unity in thinking and purpose has grown stronger under his leadership.
					
					 Regarding it as the basic principle governing the building of the party to firmly establish the party's monolithic leadership system, he has wisely led the struggle to do so.
					
					 Thanks to his tested leadership the party ranks have become purer in organizational and ideological aspects and a sure guarantee has been provided for accomplishing the Juche-oriented cause of party building on the basis of the lineage of Paektu.
					
					 He laid down important strategic lines and new policies with the aspiration and wishes of the Korean people as the starting point and absolute standard and led the party to invariably consider it as the supreme principle governing its activities to provide the people with a highly civilized and happy life.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is now struggling, regarding the trust and love for the people and selfless devoted service to the people as the mode of its existence and principle of its activities under the care of the Marshal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japanese Reactionaries for Suppressing Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japanese Reactionaries for Suppressing Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Japanese right-wing reactionary forces are becoming all the more pronounced in their chauvinist moves against Koreans after a big quake hit Japan.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday terms it a wanton encroachment on the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and vicious abuses of the rights of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan. It goes on:
					
					 The despicable suppression of Koreans in Japan is a hysteric fit of those taken aback by the tremendous might of the DPRK winning victory after victory under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Japan should clearly know socialist Korea dignified with independence and demonstrating its might by dint of Songun.
					
					 The Korean nation is not the weak nation it used to be in the past which suffered from the miserable destiny of statelessness, with its sovereignty deprived by the barbarians of an island country.
					
					 The moves of suppressing Koreans in Japan are fuelling the Korean people's hatred for Japan, the sworn enemy, and their merciless retaliatory will.
					
					 The army of Songun Korea which has grown stronger for decades ready to give vent to the pent-up grudge of the nation will not pardon those trying to mock at the destiny and vital rights of the Koreans in the least but resolutely punish them.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should be wholly responsible for the consequences to be entailed by their base and shameful suppression and persecution of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Dismisses Libel Suit against Former Director of Intelligence Service
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Dismisses Libel Suit against Former Director of Intelligence Service
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Central District Court of south Korea on April 21 dismissed the judgment made at its first hearing on the case of former Director of the Intelligence Service Won Se Hun, according to the south Korean News 1.
					 Won had been sued for besmirching the reputation of the Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo).
					
					 Won reportedly spouted a litany of rubbish terming Jongyojo a "left-wing body following the north" and " enemy inside south Korea " when chairing monthly department chiefs meetings as IS chief from February, 2009 to 2013.
					
					 Angered by it, the teachers union filed a libel suit with the court  against him, demanding reparation in 2013. 
					
					 The first hearing ruled that Won should make preparation.
					
					 But the Seoul Central District Court turned down the ruling made at the first hearing on unreasonable grounds. 
					
					 This cannot but be viewed as a despicable tyrannical action taken by the court, pursuant to the regime's suppression of the teachers union.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Vow to Carry on Their Actions
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Vow to Carry on Their Actions
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Workers of the Metal Workers Trade Unions of south Korea held a meeting for "denouncing the Yusong enterprise, the criminal group destroying the trade union, and commemorating the victory of Martyr Han Kwang Ho" in Seoul on April 27.
					 That day the security authorities hurled armed police into throwing multi-cordon around the Seoul office of the enterprise, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere from the start of the meeting. 
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that 42 days have passed since Han Kwang Ho, a worker of the Yusong enterprise in Yongdong of North Chungchong Province, committed suicide in protest against the moves to disorganize the trade union and the crackdown on it by the enterprise management.
					
					 They demanded that the enterprise management apologize to the victim and workers, punish those responsible and opt for stopping the moves to destroy the trade union and give assurances against the recurrence of the suppression, declaring they would carry on their actions till the grudge of the dead is settled.

articles.title: Protest Actions against Anti-Labor Policy Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Actions against Anti-Labor Policy Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference outside the building of the Seoul District Agency of Employment and Labor on April 26 to protest against the puppet authorities' anti-labor policy, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers said that the will of workers and other people was manifested in the recent general election.
					
					 This was a rebuff against the act of inflicting pain on the people to meet the interests of capitalists only, they noted, adding:
					
					 Nevertheless, the "government" and conservative political forces are making a retrogressive revision of the labor law to worsen the living of workers while crying out for restructuring and lay-off.
					
					 In a press release the organization declared its plan to stage large-scale actions against the regime's anti-labor policy across south Korea with the May Day as a momentum in demand of the basic labor rights of all workers.
					
					 On the same day press conferences and demos took place outside the agencies of employment and labor across south Korea all at once to condemn the authorities' moves to revise the labor law and demand the resignation of the minister of Employment and Labor.

articles.title: Nigerian Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Nigerian Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" on April 23.
					 National Chairman Damian of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria Damian Ogbonna inked the declaration on behalf of the party, saying it was a manifestation of the unanimous will of all the party members that his party signed the declaration on the meaningful occasion ahead of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Parties Sign Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Parties Sign Pyongyang Declaration
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi political parties signed the historic Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".
					 The declaration was inked by Jonaed Shaki, chief coordinator of the People's Solidarity Movement of Bangladesh, Saiful Huq, general secretary of the Revolutionary Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Moshrefa Mishu, general secretary of the Democratic Revolutionary Party of Bangladesh, and Mosharaf Hossain Nanno, general secretary of the United Communist League of Bangladesh, on behalf of their parties on April 24.
					
					 The party leaders sincerely hoped for the success of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, extending their full support to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows were held in Romania, Thailand, Singapore, Zambia and Angola from April 1 to 14 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Films shown included "Always in Hearts of Mankind", "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "Kimilsungia, Flower of the Sun" and "Pyongyang Today".

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed by Foreign Websites
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed by Foreign Websites
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Posted in foreign websites were special articles to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 SANA posted an article titled "Celebration of 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK" together with his photo on April 10. The article said the President embarked upon the road of the struggle in his teens with his far-sighted ambition to put an end to the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and liberate the country and created the immortal Juche idea, Songun idea in the first period of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The Agence Congolaise d'Information on April 11 posted an article titled "On the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President. The article said that the history of mankind records many great men but it does not know such a great man as the President who was praised and revered by all people.
					
					 The MS Travel Company of Germany posted an article titled "Peerlessly great man" on April 15 praising the President for setting forth the slogan "People of the World Advocating Independence, Unite!" and sincerely supporting the struggle of the peoples of many countries for national liberation and building of new society.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign TV services aired special programs on April 15 and 23 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Syrian Central TV in a video footage praised the career of the peerlessly great man who embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens and made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Sakirmata TV Broadcasting Service of Nepal aired twice the programs about the service personnel and people of the DPRK united close around the leaders.
					
					 The Egyptian TV aired videos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK revering President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, Mangyongdae, birth place of the President, and the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 The Nigerian TV aired an animation clip introducing the invincible might of the heroic Korean People's Army, army of the leader and the party, adding that the President fully supported the struggle of the peoples of African countries for national independence and construction of new society. It said that the President will always be alive in the hearts of mankind as the sun as he devoted his all to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Equatorial Guinea TV and Ecuadorian Television Station "Tele Andina 23" aired a video on the President's external activities and the Korean film introducing the West Sea Barrage of the DPRK.

articles.title: Group for Study of Songun Policy Formed in DR Congo University
articles.content:
Group for Study of Songun Policy Formed in DR Congo University
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Songun Policy was inaugurated at Bandundu University of DR Congo on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: KPA's History Is One of Victory: Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
KPA's History Is One of Victory: Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 16 on the occasion of the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said that President Kim Il Sung founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, 1932, made it the revolutionary armed unit in the flames of the anti-Japanese war and developed it to be the regular army after the country's liberation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The KPA resolutely rejected the brutal invasion by the U.S. imperialists against the young DPRK in the 1950s.
					
					 The DPRK, not a big country, could defeat the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world thanks to the brilliant military stratagem and commanding art of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is developing the KPA into the army of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The KPA has the power capable of striking even the U.S. mainland.
					
					 It is the strongest army in the world.
					
					 If the enemies provoke the DPRK, they will meet the ruin.
					
					 The history of the KPA is the proud one of victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Dhaka City, Bangladesh ahead of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is the proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 22.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organization Slams Suppression of Chongryon in Japan
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organization Slams Suppression of Chongryon in Japan
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a statement on April 24 slamming the Japanese reactionaries for suppressing the General Association of the Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the Koreans in Japan.
					 The statement said:
					
					 These days there witnessed in Japan hysteric hostile acts against the dignified Chongryon, legitimate organization of overseas citizens of the DPRK, and the Koreans in Japan at the extremely dangerous phase.
					
					 Right-wing reactionaries of Japan spread the rumors inciting the anti-Korean sentiments under the patronage of the authorities in relation to the heavy earthquake in Kumamoto, gravely threatening the security of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should immediately discontinue the hostile policy towards the DPRK and anti-Chongryon moves and stop infringing upon the human rights and dignity of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We support the cause of the government and people of the DPRK to protect the sovereignty and security of the country while vehemently condemning the Japanese reactionaries for resorting to mean and shabby inhuman acts.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a tropas agresoras yanquis
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a tropas agresoras yanquis
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion en relacion con que en estos dias se tornan extremadamente intensos los malignos actos provocativos de la parte de tropas agresoras norteamericanas ofendiendo seriamente a la parte de la RPDC.
					Segun ella, los dias 20 y 21, la parte de tropas yanquis cometio los peligrosos actos provocativos de incitar en el puesto de Oryonggye a los gendarmes titeres armados completamente para que estos apunten con precision a la parte nuestra. Tales hechos siguieron hasta el dia 26 del mes en curso.
					
					Con anterioridad, o sea, el dia 7, en medio de la patrulla dio alaridos extranos indicando con el dedo a los miembros de guardia de nuestra parte. Tambien el dia 10 se mofo a la parte nuestra con los gestos y acciones raros.
					
					Por otra parte, crea de modo intencional los disturbios haciendo que muchas personas militares anden en grupo en la zona de reunion de Phanmunjom bajo el pretexto de la "averiguacion topografica" y la "confirmacion de mision". Y arma alborotos orquestando la farsa de "aviso" extravagante llevando el altavoz en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que tales actos se coinciden con el momento en que los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 de caracter agresivo y otros se enfocan a la ofensiva de aplastamiento militar sin precedente contra la RPDC.
					
					La zona de Phanmunjom, donde ambas partes hostiles se enfrentan siempre arma con arma, es el lugar mas candente en que un minimo acto provocativo causal podra ocasionar en un santiamen las consecuencias catastroficas inimaginables.
					
					Lo demuestran claramente sinnumeros incidentes ocurridos en esta zona en el tiempo pasado.
					
					A sabiendas, la parte de tropas agresoras yanquis recurre a tales actos provocativos ofendiendo gravemente a los miembros de guardia de su contraparte, lo cual parte de su malsana intencion planificada e intencional. 
					
					Pagara sin falta el precio de sangre la perversa intencion de agravar la situacion tan tensa ofendiendo a nosotros en la region delicada de Phanmunjom e imputarnos su responsabilidad manchando el prestigio digno de nuestro Partido y patria 
					
					Nuestros soldados en Phanmunjom mantienen el estado de plena alerta para castigar sin piedad a los provocadores en caso de que sus locuras pasen el limite.
					
					Causara seguramente la situacion inesperada el surgimiento del conflicto en actual estado libre de control en que se rompieron completamente los aparatos juridicos e institucionales para impedir el choque fisico entre ambas partes.
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos nunca deben olvidar el fin tragico de los provocadores que actuaban con frenesi en esta zona.
					
					Tiene su limite la paciencia de nuestro ejercito indignado furiosamente.
					
					Si los enemigos siguen recurriendo a la picardia pese a nuestras advertencias reiteradas, sufriran solo la muerte de perro, en cualquier tiempo y lugar.
					
					Desde este momento, nuestro ejercito vigilara severamente los proximos movimientos de la parte de las tropas agresivas norteamericanas.

articles.title: Condenada a ciudadano norteamericano pena de trabajo reeducativo de 10 anos
articles.content:
Condenada a ciudadano norteamericano pena de trabajo reeducativo de 10 anos
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el Tribunal Supremo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el juicio al ciudadano norteamericano Kim Tong Chol, detenido por sus actos de complot de derrocamiento estatal y de espionaje.
					Estuvieron presentes alli las masas de diversos estratos.
					
					Se presento el acta de acusacion que confirma el hecho de crimen despues de examinar el registro del incidente de Kim Tong Chol, acusado correspondiente al articulo 60 (crimen de complot de derrocamiento de Estado) y al articulo 64 (crimen de espionaje) del codigo penal de la RPDC, y hubo la investigacion del hecho.
					
					En el proceso de investigacion, el acusado reconocio todos sus delitos de que con el sentimiento de hostilidad a la RPDC maniobro para derrocar su regimen difamando astutamente su dignidad maxima y regimen politico, recogio los secretos del partido, el estado y el ejercito coreanos y los entrego a los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					A continuacion, se presentaron las palabras de los testigos y materiales de prueba que confirman el crimen del acusado.
					
					En la argumentacion, el fiscal propuso al presente juicio condenar al acusado la pena de trabajo reeducativo de 15 anos, diciendo que el crimen de Kim Tong Chol corresponde al delito cometido con la meta de derrocar el regimen socialista de la RPDC, razon por la cual debe ser sometido merecidamente al castigo severo segun la ley de la RPDC.
					
					En su alegato, el abogado propuso al presente juicio condenarle no la pena de trabajo reeducativo de 15 anos propuesta por la parte de fiscal sino la otra con tiempo reducido, tomando en consideracion la edad avanzada del acusado y para que este experimentara por si mismo cuan estupido fue su proceder presenciando el verdadero aspecto de Corea socialista en prospera, aunque son muy graves sus crimenes jamas perdonables ante la patria y la nacion.
					
					En el juicio se condeno al acusado la pena de trabajo reeducativo de 10 anos.

articles.title: Inaugurada Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
articles.content:
Inaugurada Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo completada la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan No.3, otra creacion monumental de los jovenes. 
					La central es un regalo de fidelidad de los jovenes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dedicado al partido madre en ocasion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Conservando en lo profundo del corazon la gran confianza y amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien presenta a los jovenes como sucesores mas fieles al partido y firme baluarte de la patria, los brigadistas culminaron la inmensa obra en apenas de medio ano.
					
					Gracias a la culminacion de la obra, se hizo posible asegurar satisfactoriamente la demanda de la electricidad que se necesita para acondicionar mejor la zona del monte Paektu como lugar sagrado de la revolucion y lograr el desarrollo economico y la mejora de vida de la poblacion en la provincia de Ryanggang.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 28 la ceremonia inaugural de la central con la participacion de Choe Ryong Hae y O Su Yong, secretarios del Comite Central del PTC, Ri Sang Won, secretario jefe del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Ryanggang, Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los comandantes y miembros de la brigada de heroes jovenes Paektusan, constructores, empleados de la central, funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de las unidades concernientes quienes hicieron aporte a la construccion.
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					El orador dijo que la culminacion de la obra deviene un producto valioso de la gran confianza y benevolencia y la sabia orientacion del Mariscal quien presento a los jovenes como fidedignos reservas, exploradores y unidad de ala del partido y les condujo a la creacion de nuevo mito de la juventud heroina.
					
					Exhorto a todos los integrantes de la brigada a poseer como valiosos bienes espirituales el amor y la confianza del Mariscal y seguir creando el mito de la juventud heroina en la lucha por acondicionar el distrito de Samjiyon como gran museo al aire libre de la educacion de tradiciones revolucionarias.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes recorrieron la central.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Kim Jong Un por el fortalecimiento de PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Kim Jong Un por el fortalecimiento de PTC
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- En un editorial publicado este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun destaca que la mas notable hazana del Mariscal Kim Jong Un es que el fortalecio el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como gran partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista y elevo por todos los medios la capacidad directiva del partido, y enumera las proezas del Mariscal realizadas por el fortalecimiento del PTC. 
					El Mariscal formulo la idea revolucionaria de los grandes Lideres antecesores como Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, lo definio como eterna idea directriz del PTC y condujo la labor para la transformacion de todo el partido segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					Gracias a su orientacion, se han centuplicado la base ideo-espiritual y la unidad ideo-volitiva del PTC. 
					
					El Mariscal presento el establecimiento del sistema de unica direccion del partido como principio fundamental para la construccion del partido y dirigio sabiamente la labor para el respecto. 
					
					Bajo la probada orientacion del Mariscal, se ha asegurado la pureza ideologica y organizativa de las filas partidistas y preparado la firme garantia para continuar el linaje del Paektu en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del partido de tipo jucheano. 
					
					El Mariscal presenta las importantes lineas estrategicas y nuevas politicas tomando por el punto de partida y pauta absoluta la aspiracion y la demanda del pueblo y mantiene invariablemente como maximo principio de las actividades partidistas el aseguramiento de la vida feliz y civilizada del pueblo. 
					
					Bajo la orientacion del Mariscal, el PTC trabaja tomando como modo de existencia y principio de actividades la confianza, el afecto y el servicio al pueblo.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia secuestro a ciudadanas de RPDC por parte de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia secuestro a ciudadanas de RPDC por parte de banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ACNC) -- La banda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye se enfrasca en el terrorismo, la seduccion y el secuestro a los ciudadanos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a fin de liberarse de la crisis sin salida.
					A principios del mes en curso, los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, instigados por la banda traidora, secuestraron a plena luz del dia a 12 ciudadanas de la RPDC en la provincia china de Zhejiang, en complicidad con los intermediarios en el mismo terreno, y las llevaron al Sur de Corea.
					
					Es un horroroso crimen de lesa humanidad y acto terrorista internacional que puede cometer solo la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, horda de maniacos de enfrentamiento y barbaros connotados. 
					
					Hasta la fecha los crimenes de secuestro a los ciudadanos de la RPDC fueron cometidos bajo el control de Chongwadae. 
					
					En junio de 2013, Park Geun-hye dirigio en tiempo real en la "oficina de control de crisis" instalada en el refugio antiaereo subterraneo de Chongwadae una "operacion" para secuestrar y llevar al Sur de Corea a los ciudadanos norcoreanos en colectivo por parte de los agentes de la embajada surcoreana acreditada en un pais sudeste asiatico. 
					
					En aquel entonces el diario surcoreano Dong-A Ilbo revelo que era muy raro que la "mandataria" haya conducido personalmente junto con las autoridades de diplomacia y seguridad la "operacion de traslado de fugitivos norcoreanos" que hace imaginar una operacion de inteligencia, sin salir todo el dia del refugio antiaereo subterraneo de Chongwadae.
					
					En la region nordeste de China se entregan al secuestro a los ciudadanos de la RPDC los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia y otras entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea como "Consejo Religioso de Duri Hana", "Buenos Amigos" y "Asociacion de mejoramiento de DDHH del Norte de Corea", y los terroristas y agentes disfrazados de religiosos, empresarios y filantropos que reciben la ayuda financiera de las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					Para secuestrar a los ciudadanos de la RPDC, los titeres surcoreanos instalaron el aparato llamado "Fundacion de ayuda a los moradores fugitivos del Norte" y anadieron en el rubro del presupuesto los "gastos para el cruce de rio de fugitivos norcoreanos". Y hacen el trafico de esclavos de version moderna pagando el "esfuerzo" a los estudiantes, traficantes y turistas surcoreanos e integrantes de los grupos criminales extranjeros. 
					
					Los habitantes norcoreanos secuestrados y trasladados al Sur de Corea se someten durante 6 meses al interrogatorio en el "Centro de Investigacion Conjunta", compuesto por los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia, el Ministerio de Unificacion, el de Defensa Nacional y la policia del Sur de Corea. Despues, reciben durante 3-4 meses en el reclusorio llamado "Centro Hana" la "educacion de lavado de cerebro anticomunista" sufriendo vejaciones de todo tipo.
					
					Ahora los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia les imponen la "sumision" a las ciudadanas norcoreanas raptadas valiendose de todos los metodos de adormecimiento, engano, amenaza y chantaje. 
					
					Y dicen en publico que ellas "se huyeron en colectivo del Norte de Corea con la voluntad independiente y con el incertidumbre sobre el regimen norcoreano". 
					
					?Si es verdad este disparate, por que los titeres surcoreanos encarcelan por separado a las secuestradas en las celdas individuales y las aislan del exterior y por que ellas libran la lucha de ayuno demandando fuertemente devolverlas sin demora a la patria?
					
					Las ciudadanas de la RPDC recien raptadas no tienen ninguna razon de huirse al Sur de Corea abandonando su tierra natal y a sus queridos padres y hermanos. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye no puede ser perdonada nunca por su caza de seres humanos encaminada a manchar el prestigio de la RPDC que sale siempre victoriosa.
